description:
This incredible app finds you hot savings from major department stores, specialty stores and discount stores around you. So, get rid of your Sunday paper ads and flyers today and start enjoying Weekly with savings from stores like Macy's, Sears, Kohl's, Best Buy, Target, Walmart, Pet Smart, Sports Authority, Jo-Ann Stores, Dillard's, Old Navy and many more!


---------------------------------------

Features:

● Browse weekly sales from your favorite local stores
● Gorgeous flyer viewing experience using slideshow style
● HD quality images on the beautiful iPhone 4 & iPhone 5 Retina displays
● Intuitive image flip-open to see individual sale items and save them to list
● Pinch zoom in and photo-capture images
● Bookmark stores at different locations for easy access
● Build shopping list fast from sale items
● Sort list items by store and view images and items offline
● Take photos products and upload to list
● Use map and GPS to locate stores easily
● Share favorite products and sales with others
● Send shopping list to others via Email


---------------------------------------

Weekly supports over 100,000 nationwide department stores, specialty stores and discount stores across the US. You can get weekly sales from stores like Macy's, JCPenney, Best Buy, Sears, Kohl's, Jo-Ann Stores, Dillard's, Old Navy, Toys R Us, Babies R Us, Pet Smart, Sports Authority, Staples, Aaron's, Lowe's, ACE Hardware, True Value Hardware, Home Depot, GNC, Walmart, Target, CVS/pharmacy, Walgreens, Family Dollar, RadioShack, Save-A-Lot, Kmart, RiteAid, Aldi, Office Depot, Michael's, SAFEWAY, OfficeMax, Albertson's, Dick's Sporting Goods, Big 5 Sporting Goods etc.  (Please access individual stores to see if savings are available in any given week.)
trackCensoredName: Weekly Circulars, Sales, Deals & Coupon Savings, Ads for Shopping at Target, Walmart, Macy's, Walgreens, Costco, Kmart
trackName: Weekly Circulars, Sales, Deals & Coupon Savings, Ads for Shopping at Target, Walmart, Macy's, Walgreens, Costco, Kmart
releaseNotes:
- Fixed an issue where some circulars are not selectable while being loaded.
- Performance enhancements.
